| History                 = A few weeks after becoming the prisoner of [[Igor Zetaxas]], [[Hendrik Muir]] agreed to use his science to turn Zetaxas's army invisible. After betraying the dictator, Hendrik revealed that he was part of the Belavian Underground Resistance and that they even had a plan to dispose of Zetaxas' minions. Some seconds later, a team of insurgents came out of nowhere, one of whom stated that without his two hundred top officers, Igor stood no chance against them. Thanks to them, [[Belavia]] was finally set free from Igor.{{r|Tales of Suspense #4}}
